summary.span: 指定一个安装程序，该程序从组件复制属性以供安装时使用。

span.span: Specifies an installer that copies properties from a component to use at install time.

para.span: 继承自，必须重写方法，通常也重写和方法。

span.span: When you inherit from , you must override the method, and typically override the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CopyFromComponent(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub CopyFromComponent (component As IComponent)

summary.span: 在派生类中被重写时，从指定的组件复制安装时需要的所有属性。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, copies all the properties that are required at install time from the specified component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安装程序应考虑可使用从实时组件的所有信息并将其存储在安装时使用。The installer should take all the information it can from the live component, and store it for use at install time. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个类`MyInstallClass`，该类创建事件日志并将日志事件的属性复制到的组件。The following example defines a class `MyInstallClass`, which creates the event log and copies the properties of the event log component to the . 它还会检查是否可以执行相同类型的安装作为。It also checks whether the can perform the same kind of installation as the . summary.span: 确定指定的安装程序是否与此安装程序安装相同的对象。

span.span: Determines if the specified installer installs the same object as this installer.

returns.span: 如果此安装程序和 参数指定的安装程序安装相同的对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this installer and the installer specified by the parameter install the same object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，将返回`true`仅在此安装程序和安装程序指定`otherInstaller`参数安装相同的对象。Typically, returns `true` only if this installer and the installer specified by the `otherInstaller` parameter install the same object. 在这种情况下，调用或上任一安装程序会导致相同的系统状态的方法。In such a case, calling the or method on either installer results in the same system state. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个类`MyInstallClass`，该类创建事件日志并将日志事件的属性复制到的组件对象。The following example defines a class `MyInstallClass`, which creates the event log and copies the properties of the event log component to the object. 它还会检查是否对象可以处理相同类型的安装作为。It also checks whether object can handle the same kind of installation as .
